list_variables.description: Network ingress authorization for an Amazon EC2 security group or an IP address range.
list_variables.name: DBSecurityGroupIngress
list_variables.type: List of RDS                      Security Group Rules.

list_variables.description: The tags that you want to attach to the Amazon RDS DB security group.
list_variables.name: Tags

variables.description: The Id of VPC. Indicates which VPC this DB Security Group should belong to.
variables.name: EC2VpcId
variables.required: Conditional. Must be specified to create a DB Security Group for                   a VPC; may not be specified otherwise.
